channel.title: Driver Development on Exists4All
channel.description: Recent content in Driver Development on Exists4All

item.title: How to make your own Simple Kernel static Disk Serial Spoofer on Windows part 1
item.description: In this tutorial we are going to find out which Kernel APIs are used to get disk serials in WIndows 11 by reverse engineering the Windows Kernel. And then patching Kernel to assign random serial disks from ring 0.

item.title: Important notes about Kernel development on Windows
item.description: Important things that you should keep in mind before starting your kernel journey!
